description:
Biblia Takatifu ya Kiswahili (Swahili Bible) with King James Bible English Version
Biblia ya Kikristo ni mkusanyo wa maandiko matakatifu ya Ukristo. Maandiko hayo mbalimbali yanaitwa tangu zamani sana "vitabu" tu, inavyomaanishwa na neno "biblia" ambalo ni uwingi wa neno la Kigiriki "biblos" yaani "kitabu".
Hutofautishwa na Tanakh ambayo ndiyo maandiko matakatifu ya dini ya Uyahudi na ambayo pengine inatajwa kwa jina lilelile la "Biblia", hasa katika matoleo ya Biblia ya Kiebrania . Vitabu vyake vimo katika sehemu ya kwanza ya Biblia ya Kikristo kwa jina la "Agano la Kale".
Biblia ya Kikristo hugawiwa sehemu mbili ambayo ni Agano la Kale na Agano Jipya. Agano la Kale lina maandiko yaliyoandikwa kabla ya Yesu Kristo na vitabu vya Agano Jipya viliandikwa baada yake.
Agano la Kale
Kimsingi vitabu vya Agano la Kale ni vilevile vya Biblia ya Kiebrania, ingawa madhehebu ya Kikristo hutofautiana kidogo katika hilo. Ni kwamba wakati wa kutokea kwa Ukristo palikuwa na tofauti ndani ya Uyahudi kuhusu vitabu vilivyohesabiwa kuwa maandiko matakatifu. Suala hilo liliondolewa kuanzia mwaka 80 BK wataalamu wa Wayahudi wa huko Jabneh (Jamnia) walipochukua msimamo mkali dhidi ya wafuasi wa Yesu.
Kwa wakati huo Wakristo walikuwa wamezoea tayari toleo la Kigiriki la maandiko matakatifu yaliyotafsiriwa katika karne ya 2 KK ambalo linajulikana kwa jina la Septuaginta na kuwa na vitabu kadhaa visivyokuwa vimetunzwa katika lugha asili ya Kiebrania wala ya Kiaramu, au vilivyoandikwa moja kwa moja katika lugha ya Kigiriki.
Hivyo Biblia ya Kikristo ilikuwa na vitabu 7 (viwili vya Wamakabayo, Yoshua bin Sira, Hekima, Tobiti, Yudith na Baruku, pamoja na sehemu za Esta na Danieli) visivyokubaliwa baadaye na Wayahudi.
Vitabu hivyo 7 vikaja kukataliwa na Martin Luther katika karne ya 16, halafu na Waprotestanti wengi, lakini vinazidi kutumiwa na Kanisa Katoliki na Waorthodoksi kwa jina la Deuterokanoni.
Agano Jipya
Kuna vitabu 27 vya Agano Jipya. Vinne vya kwanza ni Injili nne zinazoleta habari za maisha, matendo na maneno ya Yesu.
Vingine ni Matendo ya Mitume, Nyaraka za Mitume, hasa Mtume Paulo, na Ufunuo wa Yohane.

Your Complete Spiritual Companion 
Holy Quran  is designed for Muslims seeking a seamless, all-in-one app for their spiritual needs. Whether you’re looking for prayer time muslim reminders, salah guide for beginners, or Dhikr tracking, this app brings everything together in a simple and easy-to-use interface. Stay connected with your faith anytime, anywhere. 

Key Features 
Automatic prayer time alarm for all five daily prayers. 
Accurate qibla direction finder for wherever you are. 
Full holy book Quran text for easy reading and recitation. 
High-quality Quran mp3 full offline access to 114 surahs. 
Digital tasbih counter to track your Dhikr effortlessly. 
Morning and evening azkar reminders to keep you spiritually connected. 
Learn and reflect on the 99 names of Allah with meanings and benefits. 

Never Miss a Prayer 
With Holy Quran, you’ll always stay on time for your prayers. The app automatically sends alerts for salah time like Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha, ensuring you never miss an important moment of worship. And with the accurate qibla direction feature, you’ll always know the correct direction to pray, no matter where you are. 

Read and Listen to the Quran 
The app offers both a full al Quran text for easy reading and a complete audio version of all 114 surahs. Whether you prefer to read or listen, you can engage with the holy book Quran in a way that suits your lifestyle. The Quran audio mp3 feature ensures you can access it even when offline. 

Find the Qibla Instantly 
No need to worry about finding the Qibla while traveling or in unfamiliar places. The app’s highly accurate qibla compass direction helps you locate the exact direction for prayer with just one tap, whether you're using it offline or online. 

Simplified Dhikr & Spiritual Growth 
Use the built-in tasbeeh counter to keep track of your Dhikr easily and accurately. Whether you’re at home, traveling, or on the go, this feature helps you stay connected to your faith through daily remembrance. Additionally, explore the 99 names of Allah with meaning to gain deeper insight into their significance and benefits, further enriching your spiritual journey. 

What Sets Us Apart? 
Holy Quran - Deeper Journey offers more than just the basics. We combine offline Quran audio, easy-to-use prayer alarms, and a highly accurate qibla finder in one simple app. It’s designed to be your comprehensive Islamic companion, offering everything you need for your spiritual growth without the hassle of switching between multiple apps. 
Download Holy Quran today and take the next step in your spiritual journey with confidence. All your spiritual tools—prayer time table, Quran reading, and Dhikr tracking—are now in one place, easy, accessible, and reliable. 

Your review is our appreciation. We will try our best to respond to all your contributions and improve the app base on your contributions. Download the Al Quran Sharif Prayer Time and rate 5 our app will be your Islamic companion.


Policy link: https://sites.google.com/view/pp-holy-quran/home  
EULA link: https://sites.google.com/view/eula-holy-quran/home

Al Quran MP3 – Full Quran with Audio, Translation, Tafseer, and Offline Access

Experience the complete Holy Quran in one easy-to-use Islamic app, perfect for Ramadan, daily worship, and every Islamic month. Al Quran MP3 offers full Quran Kareem recitation with MP3 audio, translations in over 20 languages, verse-by-verse Tafseer, and offline reading and listening. Whether you are looking to read, listen, or study the Quran, this app is your trusted Islamic companion for everyday spiritual growth.

This all-in-one app also includes essential Islamic tools like accurate prayer times with Azan notifications, a Qibla direction finder, Islamic calendar with Ramadan and Eid dates, a smart Zakat calculator, daily Duas and Hadith, and an AI-powered Islamic assistant to answer your questions.

Key Features of Al Quran MP3 – القرآن الكريم:

1. Read and Listen to the Full Quran Offline

    Complete Quran with Arabic text and 16-line Mushaf PDF

    High-quality MP3 audio recitation by world-renowned Qaris

    Offline mode for reading and listening without internet access

2. Quran with Translation in 20+ Languages

    Word-by-word translation for deeper understanding

3. Tafseer for In-Depth Understanding

    Verse-by-verse Tafseer to understand the context and meaning

    Ideal for students, scholars, and daily readers

4. Transliteration for Non-Arabic Speakers

    Romanized Arabic text to help with pronunciation and Tajweed

    Great for beginners learning to read the Quran

5. Quran MP3 Player

    Listen to Quran recitation by multiple famous Qaris

    Supports background audio playback and multitasking

6. Qibla Direction Finder

    Accurate Qibla compass to locate the Kaaba from anywhere

    Works offline and globally

7. Accurate Prayer Times and Azan Alerts

    Real-time prayer timings based on your location

    Azan notifications for all five daily prayers

    Supports global prayer time calculation methods (ISNA, MWL, Umm al-Qura)

8. Zakat Calculator

    Automatically calculate your annual Zakat with support for gold, silver, cash, and assets

    Based on Islamic rules to help ensure accurate Zakat giving

9. Islamic Calendar

    Hijri and Gregorian calendar with key Islamic dates

    Includes Ramadan, Eid, Hajj, and other important events

10. Daily Islamic Content for Spiritual Growth

    Daily Dua, Verse, Hadith, and Surah recommendations

    Stay connected with your faith every day

11. AI Mufti – Ask Islamic Questions Instantly

    Get answers to your Islamic questions using AI-powered technology

    Covers Quranic interpretation, Hadith, Islamic rulings, and more

Why Choose Al Quran MP3 – القرآن الكريم?

    Full offline Quran app with audio

    User-friendly interface for all ages

    Customizable reading experience with font size, color themes, and more

    Designed for daily use, Ramadan, Hifz memorization, and all Islamic months

Al Quran MP3 is more than just a Quran reader or audio player – it’s your complete Islamic app for spiritual growth, learning, and daily worship.

Download Al Quran MP3 – القرآن الكريم now and deepen your connection with the Holy Quran.

Biblia Takatifu refers to the Holy Bible in Swahili.

The translation of the Bible into Swahili began in the early 19th century with efforts by Christian missionaries. The first complete Bible in Swahili was published in 1890. The Swahili Bible plays a big role in the religious life and cultural heritage of the Swahili-speaking people. 

The complete version of the Swahili Bible, also called Biblia Takatifu, was published in 1890 by the British and Foreign Bible Society. Some of the famous translations are Biblia Neno, Biblia Habari Njema, Biblia Takatifu, and Biblia Ya Kiswahili.

Features:

	•	DAILY VERSE - Once you set the reminder, you will receive day-to-day notifications to read your daily Bible verses.

	•	MY LIBRARY - It is like the personal space of the user, as it contains all the highlighted verses and notes you make from reading the Bible. You can also bookmark the verses that you love.

	•	It includes both the OLD and NEW TESTAMENTS.

	•	AUDIO BIBLE - Listen to the words of the lord in audio format.

	•	SOCIAL MEDIA POST  - Bible verses with images are available; you can choose your favourite verse and share it with your friends and family on social media.

	•	WALLPAPERS - Many beautiful varieties are available, and you can download anything for free.

	•	VIDEOS - It has animated Biblical videos on so many topics, such as Jesus, Sad, Hope, Blessings, Alone, Wisdom, Motivation, Gratitude, Blessings, God’s Promises, forgiveness, healing, and considerably more.

	•	MIRACLE PRAYER - It has many different prayers according to all our wants, for example, morning prayer, bedtime prayer for healing, and much more.

	•	BIBLE STORIES - Bible stories for kids are available in a separate folder.

	•	FESTIVE CALENDAR - It displays all the Christian festive days.

	•	QUOTES       -  It has Bible quotes in the form of images and text that can be shared on social media with your friends and family.

Meloshort: Your Ultimate Destination for Popular Short Dramas and Must-Watch Mini-Series

In today’s fast-paced world, finding time to unwind and enjoy quality entertainment can be a challenge. That’s where Meloshort comes in — the ultimate app designed specifically for busy viewers like you, who crave engaging stories but have limited time. With episodes lasting just 1 to 2 minutes, Meloshort offers a vast and diverse library of popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series that perfectly fit into your fragmented schedule.
Whether you are commuting, grabbing a quick coffee break, or just squeezing in some entertainment between daily tasks, Meloshort lets you dive into cinematic-quality storytelling anytime, anywhere. Experience the grandeur of ancient costume dramas, the sweetness and charm of modern romances, the thrill of intense boss hero stories, or the gripping suspense of revenge thrillers — all in beautifully produced HD formats that bring these worlds to life on your screen.

Diverse Genres to Match Every Mood
Our ever-expanding collection covers a rich variety of genres, ensuring there is something for everyone:
- Sweet Pet Romance: Heartwarming stories filled with adorable love and tender moments.
- Emotional Sadomasochistic Passion: Complex, intense relationships full of raw emotion and drama.
- Thrilling Suspense Mysteries: Edge-of-your-seat narratives packed with twists and turns.
- Heartfelt Campus Stories: Relatable tales of youth, friendship, and first love.
- Urban Emotional Dramas: Deeply engaging stories that explore the complexities of modern city life.
With new episodes and series added every week, your watchlist will never run dry. Our smart recommendation engine learns your tastes and suggests fresh content tailored just for you, helping you discover your next favorite popular short drama or must-watch mini-series effortlessly.

Features Tailored for Your Viewing Pleasure
Meloshort isn’t just about great stories — it’s about making your viewing experience smooth, personalized, and enjoyable. Some of our key features include:
- Playback Speed Control: Adjust episode speed to match your viewing pace — slow down to savor moments or speed up when you’re short on time.
- Personal Watchlist: Easily organize and keep track of all the mini-series you want to watch.
- User-Friendly Interface: Navigate effortlessly through a sleek, intuitive design with stunning HD visuals that make every episode a pleasure to watch.

Global Appeal and Accessibility
Recognizing the global audience we serve, Meloshort supports:
- Multilingual Subtitles: Catering to viewers worldwide by providing subtitles in multiple languages.
- Localized Dubbing: Enjoy your favorite dramas in your native language with high-quality dubbing options.
From palace intrigues and CEO romances to campus crushes and emotional urban tales, Meloshort delivers a rich tapestry of stories that resonate across cultures and geographies.

Why Choose Meloshort?
- Optimized for Busy Lives: Episodes last just 1-2 minutes, perfect for watching on the go or during short breaks.
- High-Quality Content: Each drama is carefully selected or produced with cinematic quality, offering you an immersive viewing experience.
- Constantly Updated Library: Fresh content added weekly keeps the excitement alive and your watchlist full.
- Smart Recommendations: Our intelligent algorithm helps you find exactly the kinds of shows you’ll love.

Download Meloshort Today!
Join millions of viewers worldwide who have made Meloshort their go-to app for bite-sized entertainment. Experience fast, high-quality storytelling designed perfectly for your busy lifestyle. Download Meloshort now, start exploring the hottest popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series, and never miss a moment of great storytelling again!

Your Complete Spiritual Companion

Quran Kareem brings prayer, recitation, and daily remembrance into one simple, beautiful app. Get precise prayer times with Athan alerts, find Qibla instantly, read or listen to the full Holy Quran, and stay consistent with dua, azkar, and a built-in digital tasbih—online or offline.

Key Features

• Accurate Prayer Times & Athan
Automatic prayer times for all five daily prayers based on your location and preferred calculation/ madhab settings. Choose Athan sounds and gentle reminders so you never miss a prayer.

• Live Qibla Compass
Point your phone and face the right direction—anywhere. The real-time Qibla compass includes calibration help and a map view for clarity indoors and outdoors.

• Full Holy Quran (114 Surahs)
Read the complete Quran with clear Arabic text. Adjust font size, night mode, and line spacing for comfortable reading. Quickly jump to surahs, ayahs, or Juz, and add bookmarks for your place.

• High-Quality Quran Audio (Offline)
Listen to recitations from selected Qaris with continuous playback—even when the screen is off. Download surahs for offline listening to keep your khatm moving anywhere.

• Translations & Tafsir
Understand the meaning with popular translations (English and other languages). Toggle word-by-word or verse-by-verse views. Optional tafsir provides deeper context.

• Dhikr & Tasbih Counter
A smart digital tasbih you can customize for your daily adhkar. Haptic tick, progress goals, and history help you build consistent habits.

• Daily Dua & Azkar
Morning and evening azkar collections with reminders you control. Save your favorites and track what you’ve completed.

• 99 Names of Allah
Learn and reflect on Asma’ul Husna with meanings and benefits—study mode or gentle daily prompts.

• Ramadan-Ready
Suhur/Iftar times, pre-prayer reminders, and auto-download for your most-played surahs to make Ramadan smooth and focused.

Designed for Ease & Focus
Clean design, readable typography, and fast navigation keep your attention on worship. Works offline for reading, listening, and dhikr when you’re on the go.

Privacy & Respect
No clutter, no distractions—just reliable tools to support your spiritual routine.

Unlock the Power of Prayer

Immerse yourself in the wisdom of the Bible with the personalized reading experience. Tailor your journey to suit your preferences by creating notes, highlights, and bookmarks. Key Features:

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

My Novena – Sala za Kila Siku za Novena

Pata Novena maarufu za Kikatoliki kwa Kiswahili, zikiwemo:

Novena kwa Mtakatifu Yosefu

Novena kwa Mtakatifu Rita wa Kashia

Novena kwa Huruma ya Mungu

Novena kwa Mama Bikira Maria
Novena kwa mtakatifu Antoni wa Padua

Novena ya Roho Mtakatifu

App hii ya bure hukuwezesha:
1.  Kusali novena kwa siku 9 hadi 12
2.  Kuweka alama ya siku uliyoomba
3. Kupata sala za kila siku kwa urahisi
4. Kufuatilia maendeleo yako ya sala
5. Kupata kumbukumbu ya sala maalum kwa kila mtakatifu

Tunakupa njia rahisi na ya kiroho ya kukua katika imani yako kupitia sala na tafakari kila siku.

Tumia majina kama:

"Novena ya Mtakatifu Yosefu"
"Novena ya Roho Mtakatifu"
"Rozari takatifu"
"Sala kwa kiswahili"
"Mistari ya biblia"
"Novena ya Mt. Rita"

"Sala za Kikatoliki"
kupata app hii haraka kwenye App Store!

Chagua My Novena – Maombi Yako, Kila Siku.

Gundua maisha ya kiroho yenye kuridhisha zaidi ukiwa na Shajara na Sala, App ambayo ni msaidizi wako wa imani mahususi kwa jumuiya ya Kikatoliki.
Programu hii pana inaunganisha maandiko na mapokeo matakatifu ili kukuongoza katika ibada ya kila siku na uelewa wa imani ya Kikatoliki.

Sifa Muhimu:

-Tafakari ya Shajara ya Kila Siku:
Anza siku yako kwa kutafakari kwa kina juu ya Injili na zaidi. Acha maneno ya Kristo yaangaze akili yako na kuongoza matendo yako unapotafakari Maandiko Matakatifu.

-Kusali na Kutafakari kwa Sala:
Jihusishe na sala takatifu kupitia mbinu iliyopangwa. Soma maneno matakatifu, tafakari ili kuelewa maana za ndani zaidi, omba kwa ajili ya mwongozo wa kiroho.

Pakua sasa na ubadilishe maisha yako ya imani kwa hazina za tamaduni za Kikatoliki, zote mikononi mwako.

Nyimbo za Kristo contains hymns sung by Christians. The app features intuitive search functionality, which allows you to search by song name, verse, or chorus. The search is fuzzy, so you don't have to type the exact phrase to find your desired song.

Discover the power of seamless communication with our English to Swahili Translator App. Whether you need to translate English to Swahili, convert English to Swahili, or find precise translations using our comprehensive English to Swahili Dictionary, this app has you covered.

Designed for both learners and travelers, our app offers an intuitive interface to help you translate English to Swahili with ease. Switch effortlessly between Swahili to English and English to Swahili translations, ensuring you always have the right words at your fingertips.

Key Features:

- Instant Translation: Translate English to Swahili and vice versa instantly.
- Comprehensive Dictionary: Utilize our extensive English to Swahili Dictionary for accurate word meanings.
- Language Converter: Convert English to Swahili or Swahili to English with a simple tap.
- User-Friendly Interface: Navigate between English and Swahili translations seamlessly.
- Offline Mode: Access translations and dictionary entries even without an internet connection.
- Audio Pronunciations: Improve your pronunciation with audio examples for both English and Kiswahili.

Whether you are learning the English to Swahili language, traveling, or need an efficient English and Kiswahili communication tool, our app is your perfect companion. Experience the best in translation technology with the English to Swahili Translator App.

Want to strengthen your connection with the Quran? Try our Al Quran app, used by over 13 million people worldwide.

Understand the Quran in your language with Tafsir. Listen to recitations and explore word-by-word meanings and grammar. Search, bookmark, take notes, and track your progress for deeper study.

Listen to beautiful recitations by your favourite Qaris, follow along with tajweed, and read from familiar Mushaf pages, all in one app. This app is completely free with no ads!

Let’s explore how this easy-to-use Quran app will help you connect with the Quran more meaningfully.

Translations, Tafsirs and Surah Info
- Understand the Quran by studying 170+ Translations & Tafsirs of the Quran in 60+ languages: English, Indonesian, Bangla, Hindi, Urdu, German, Chinese, French, Italian, Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tamil, and many more!
- 8 Arabic Tafsirs (including Tafseer Ibn Kathir, Tafseer Tabari, etc.) along with Arabic E3rab, Word Meaning, Asbabun Nuzul
- Surah info: Surah summary and virtues

Word by Word Analysis & Translations
- Read Word by Word translations of the Quran in English, Indonesian, Bangla, German, Hindi, Ingush, Malay, Russian, Tamil, Turkish and Urdu
- Study and analyse Word Root/Lemma, Grammar, Morphology, Occurrences in different forms and Verb Forms to dive in more depth. Helpful to learn & understand Quranic Arabic

Mushaf Mode
- Recite Quran in Mushaf mode to have the same experience when reciting from a hard-copy Mushaf
- Available Mushaf scripts: Madani, Naskh Indopak, Qaloon, Shemerly, Warsh

Library: Bookmarks & Notes
- Bookmark ayahs to your own Collections and keep track of the last read ayah using Pins
- Start reading from where you left off using auto Last Reads
- Reflect and take notes for each ayah (آية)
- Sync library across multiple devices and even share with others using import/export

Search & Quran Subject-wise Topics
- Powerful Search with highlights to quickly find what you are looking for
- Explore by Topics & read the ayahs related to a topic together

Quran Audio
- Listen to Quran recitations by 80+ reciters with Quran audio translation in 10+ languages (downloadable for offline use)
- Reciter Options: Mishary Al Afasy, Husary, Ayman Suwaid, Abdur Rahman As-Sudais and many others
- Powerful Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorisation/Quran Hifz
- Reciters tagged based on recitation types: Murattal, Mujawwad, Translation
- Arabic Audio Commentary and Quran audio translation in Bangla, English, Urdu others

Quran Planner, Streak and Badges
- Plan your Khatmah of the Quran using the Quran Planner
- Set your daily reading target, track and increase it gradually
- Monitor your weekly activity
- Build a daily Quran reading habit using Streak
- Earn badges for completing Streak Milestones and exploring app features

Various Customisation Options, Tajweed & Others
- Read in Uthmanic or Indopak script
- Read Tafsirs in Tafsir view
- Recite Tajweed colour-coded Quran with ease
- Quran Dictionary: See the list of roots for different Arabic alphabets
- Various fonts and multiple themes, including Night mode
- Autoscroll feature
- Copy & Share the verses
- All feature supports offline (Quran offline)

15+ Languages
- Arabic, English, Bangla, German, French, Bahasa Indonesia / Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Turkish, Urdu, and more

Download the ad-free Quran app and start your journey to a deeper understanding of the Quran!

Share and recommend this beautiful app to your friends and family. May Allah bless us in this world and the hereafter.

Al Quran - القران الكريم app is an authentic Islamic application that complements the traditional printed Qur'an, providing a variety of features for Listening & Reading Holy Quran for iPhone and iPad users.
تطبيق Al Quran - القران الكريم هو تطبيق إسلامي أصيل يكمّل القرآن المطبوع التقليدي، حيث يوفر مجموعة من الميزات للاستماع وقراءة القران الكريم لمستخدمي آيفون وآيباد.

The Qur'an, revered as the Holy Book of Islam, stands as the ultimate source of guidance and wisdom for all of humanity. In the divine revelation, the Angel Jibril (AS) conveyed Allah's profound words to the revered Prophet Muhammad (صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم) over the course of 23 years, shaping the sacred scripture into its transcendent form.

القرآن، الذي يعتبر كتاب الله المقدس في الإسلام، يقف كمصدر نهائي للهداية والحكمة لكل البشر. في الوحي الإلهي، قام الملك جبريل (عليه السلام) بنقل كلمات الله العميقة إلى النبي المحترم محمد (صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم) على مدى ٢٣ عامًا، صاغًا بذلك كتاب المقدس في شكله السامي.

Al Quran - القران الكريم is a beautiful and inspiring Holy Book, and it is said that the recitation of the Qur'an is one of the most rewarding acts of worship. 
The Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) said, The best among you are those who learn the Qur'an and teach it." (Sahih Bukhari, Hadith number 5029)
 
القران - القران الكريم هو كتاب مقدس جميل وملهم، ويقال أن تلاوة القران من أكثر العبادات مكافأة. 
قال النبي محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم: «خيركم من تعلم القران وعلمه» - (صحيح البخاري، الحديث رقم ٥٠٢٩)
Features:

Experience seamless reading with our app's resume feature for Quran قران readers and reciters. Enjoy crystal-clear HD quality with a 16 line display mirroring the precision of a paper Quran. Unlike traditional paper versions, our app's Arabic Word Zoom feature allows users to read with enhanced accuracy and the ability to zoom in. Our efficient search function, combined with the Go To Page feature, enables users to navigate directly to any Qur'an page, enhancing the overall user experience.

Our Quran Majeed  القران المجيد app also provides the Hijri date, with an available option for hijri date adjustment. You can manually adjust the Hijri date according to your preferences.

Discover our Global Prayer Times Clock, equipped with Azan / Adhan alarms featuring short and long adhan sounds. With support for diverse prayer time calculation methods, the app automatically detects your current location and calculates prayer timings for you. Customize manually as needed.

To cater to the diverse needs of Muslim residing in various countries, our Al Quran - القران الكريم is fully available in local languages such as English, Arabic, Hindi, Indonesian, Urdu, Persian, Turkish, Malay, Malayalam, French, Russian, Uzbek, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, German, Thai, and Bengali. This broad language support is designed to enhance the experience for Muslims across the globe.

Indulge in the melodic recitations of 20+ renowned Quran reciters on Al Quran - القران الكريم app. Seamlessly stream or save audio for offline listening, featuring distinguished voices from World famous reciters

No one to recite to? No problem. Tarteel AI is here!

How many times have you wished you knew more surahs to use in salah? That you could get feedback on your recitation whenever you needed it? That you could memorize more, and worry less?

Hide. Tap. Recite. In three easy moves, you’re strengthening your memorization of the Quran with the world’s leading AI Quran memorization companion. Simply hide the verses, tap the mic and start reciting. The pages will fill with your recitation and if you make a mistake, Tarteel’s intuitive AI will be sure let you know INSTANTLY with its flagship feature, Memorization Mistake Detection. That’s live feedback on your recitation, any time, anywhere - even if you whisper! 

Whether you’re memorizing for your next Hifz class or revising Juz Amma on your daily commute, Tarteel adapts to your recitation, tracks your progress and aligns with your goals. It’s your companion —helping you memorize better, build confidence, and create a Quran habit that lasts a lifetime. No matter where you are in your memorization, Tarteel is here for the journey. 

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team operates within the framework of Ihsan, striving for excellence and using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Supercharge your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Try it now for FREE, no credit card required. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we know there’s community demand and it’s on our roadmap for the future!

- Hidden Verses

Hide the verses and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Goals

Set custom Goals for what you want to memorize and revise. Choose your portion, deadline and the type of engagement you want; memorization, reading, revision or recitation!

- Historical Mistakes

Progress is key! Tarteel keeps a record of all of your mistakes so you know exactly where your memorization is strong and what could use a little more work. 

- Unlimited Listening and Audio

Solidify your memorization with listening and audio! Choose your favourite Qari, the portion and how many times you want to listen. 

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement. 

—

Join the 9M+ Muslims worldwide who are using Tarteel to support their memorization of the Quran!

Do you use Tarteel? Your feedback helps us improve the platform and add to our long-term roadmap. If you’ve benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review - we’d love to hear from you! Request new features here: [http://feedback.tarteel.ai](http://feedback.tarteel.ai/)

—

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please ensure you allow Tarteel to access these permissions on your device.
